Miru

Mobile app for streaming anime

About the project

Note: Miru's development has been on hiatus since 2019. It may resume development in the future, but focus has been moved to other projects

Miru is a mobile app for streaming anime. It utilizes scraping of various online sources to get the content it provides. Miru is broken up into 2 parts, an app and a server. The app is written in Flutter and Dart and interacts with a custom API written specifically for the app. The server, written in NodeJS, scrapes various sources and caches the data to serve to each client
